name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2014
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2014年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots produced through this industrial process are primarily used for manufacturing various aluminum products including construction materials, automotive components, packaging such as cans and foils, and consumer electronics. The ingots serve as a secondary raw material, substituting for primary aluminum obtained from bauxite ore, reducing the environmental impact from mining and processing.
通过该工业过程生产的再生铝锭主要用于制造各种铝制品，包括建筑材料、汽车组件、包装（如罐头和箔材）以及消费电子产品。这些锭作为二次原材料，替代从铝土矿石中获取的原铝，减少了采矿和加工的环境影响。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots produced through this industrial process are primarily used for manufacturing various aluminum products including construction materials, automotive components, packaging such as cans and foils, and consumer electronics. The ingots serve as a secondary raw material, substituting for primary aluminum obtained from bauxite ore, reducing the environmental impact from mining and processing.
通过该工业过程生产的再生铝锭主要用于制造各种铝制品，包括建筑材料、汽车组件、包装（如罐头和箔材）以及消费电子产品。这些锭作为二次原材料，替代从铝土矿石中获取的原铝，减少了采矿和加工的环境影响。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data for recycled aluminum ingots, it is critical to ensure the boundaries of the system are well-defined, particularly concerning the end-of-life treatment of products using this material. Take into account the allocation of impacts between recycling and primary production processes. Exclude the impacts from primary aluminum production when accounting for recycled content. The background data should be carefully considered as it is localized to the Chinese context from CAS RCEES 2018; differences in geographic and technological aspects could affect the applicability of the data for processes outside China.
在使用再生铝锭的LCA数据时，确保系统边界明确划定至关重要，特别是与使用此材料的产品的生命周期终端处理相关时。考虑在回收和初级生产过程之间影响的分配。计算回收含量时，应排除初级铝生产的影响。此外，应仔细考虑背景数据，因为它是依据中国科学院生态环境研究中心 (CAS RCEES) 2018 的本地化数据；地理和技术方面的差异可能影响数据在中国以外过程的适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
